about_the_game:
Demo Introduction: "LingTian1" is a female-oriented 3D visual style romance game. Players take on the role of an ordinary girl from Fang Kingdom, embarking on a romantic adventure and sweet love story with Prince LingTian of Fang Kingdom. This is the demo version of the first episode in the "LingTian" series.
▌Demo Version
Playtime: Approximately 3 hours
Unlockable Content: Full content of Chapters 1-5, about 35% of the complete game
3D Dynamic Videos: Over 500 clips
Voice Acting: Full voice acting for all characters
Unlockable Songs: 2 theme songs
Interactive Content: 1 video call, 2 text message chats, 1 prince's diary entry
Mini-Game: Includes a replayable mini-game where you stick patches to the prince


▌Romance
As an ordinary girl from Fang Kingdom, you will experience a romantic story with Prince LingTian. All the wonderful fate stems from your kind heart. Now, open a magnificent chapter of royal romance filled with love and sweetness!



▌Prince and you
LingTian:Prince of Fang Kingdom, fourth in line for the throne.Tall, handsome, upright, and diligent.The prince fell deeply in love with you before the Quest For Love Event. He went to great lengths to bring you into the Fang palace, solely to repay you, protect you, and love you.
You: You come from a poor family, and your mother urges you to sign up for the prince's Quest for Love Event. You are kind and hardworking, you excel at making braised pork rice. While studying at a culinary academy, you also work part-time at a restaurant.Although unaware of the prince's feelings, the prince has already arrived at the restaurant and stands before you, deeply and madly in love with you...


▌Gameplay
-Watch the Story/Make Choices: Enjoy a story like watching a movie and advance your romance with the prince. The demo version includes 4 side endings. Your task is to progress the main storyline. By accumulating various scores such as his smile, his heartbeat, and his warmth, you can unlock different rooms of the prince and find clues to solve the main puzzle.
-Mini-Games: Solve puzzles by collecting important pieces through mini-games like choosing patches for the prince.
-Daily Interaction and Accompaniment: Interact with the prince through phone calls, messages, and reading his diary.
-Songs and Video Clips: Listen to these songs and review important video clips.


▌ What Prince LingTian said to you
-"If we can't be friends, then how about being lovers? I'm asking you seriously, will you be my girlfriend, my princess?"
-"I am incredibly grateful to you for saving me, but I don't have any cash on hand to repay you. I only have this large check, please accept it!"


▌ Destined Love with 1000 Princes Series
This is a female-oriented romance game series, featuring a highly engaging 3D visual novel style. Players can choose different princes to enter a luxurious and sweet romance. Each app game is named after a different prince. Every prince cares for you, loves you, protects you, supports you, encourages you, and understands you.


▌About the Developer
琴研 Ginyan: I am a romance novel author. I spent three and a half years learning iClone and CC to create 3D animations, as well as the Unity game engine. With the help of various AI tools, I created my first game, "Ling Tian 1". The romance is adapted from my novel.
